mysql.name: t_sku_inventory_1
mysql.sql: update t_sku u set u.TOTAL_INVENTORY =1 where u.ITEM_ID = '%(itemID)s' and u.SKU_NAME = '%(attrItemValue)s';

mysql.name: t_sku_inventory_0
mysql.sql: update t_sku u set u.TOTAL_INVENTORY =0 where u.ITEM_ID = '%(itemID)s' and u.SKU_NAME = '%(attrItemValue)s';

mysql.name: t_sku_inventory_10
mysql.sql: update t_sku u set u.TOTAL_INVENTORY =10 where u.ITEM_ID = '%(itemID)s' and u.SKU_NAME = '%(attrItemValue)s';

mysql.name: t_points_1
mysql.sql: update t_points s set s.TOTAL_POINTS = 1 where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s';

mysql.name: t_points_99999999
mysql.sql: update t_points s set s.TOTAL_POINTS = 99999999 where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s';
